mapper.sql: TIDString, TName, DomainId, TIP, ISCMIC, ISAutoCast, isuse, Precinct
mapper.select:
select TIDString, TName, t.DomainId as DomainId, TIP, ISCMIC, ISAutoCast, a.DomainName as DomainName, FinalOfflineDate, Precinct from t LEFT JOIN a on t.DomainId=a.DomainId where t.isuse = 1 and a.isuse = 1
and t.DomainId like CONCAT(#{pd.DomainId},"%")
and (TIDString like CONCAT("%",CONCAT(#{pd.imeikey},"%")) or TName like CONCAT("%",CONCAT(#{pd.imeikey},"%")))
ORDER BY TIDString asc
